page.title: 09Life on Thistleflat Estate.
page.content: Thistleflat is an estate of private houses built by Barratts. There are some swings for the children and a big grass hill.An ice-cream van and a van containing vegetables and other foods comes round for the old people who are unable to go down the hill to Crook. There are no buses travelling around our estate because it is busy enough with the number of cars. The dogs play and run about on the grass areas and around the trees.The builders are costructing some more houses. I live in a bungalow.Most are the same style with 2/3 bedrooms,a small kitchen and a long living room.The semi-detached,detached and link house are all 3/4 bedrooms but there are some small two bedroom flats.Most of the properties have a garage.
